name: Kitchen
description: A bright and sunny kitchen with a dead mouse in the center and an item that was knocked over. Pawficer Fluffenstuff is waiting to give you a summary.

npc.name: Pawficer Fluffenstuff
npc.dialogue: Glad you're here, Purrlock Holmes. It appears the victim, Julius Cheeser was poisoned. The residents are throughout the house waiting to be questioned.
randDialogue: Looks like this mouse is no longer saying cheese.
Looks like a deadly game of hide and squeak.
Looks like this dead mouse isn't making music anymore.

item.name: trash can
item.description: A trash can that was knocked over with a clue inside

name: Backyard
description: A spacious backyard with Benedict Cumberbark waiting by his dog house

npc.name: Benedict Cumberbark
npc.dialogue: I went to get a snack in the trash and then saw the body. I pulled this item out of the trash.
randDialogue: I'm having a rough a ruff day
If you think it was me, you're barking up the wrong tree.

item.name: bag
item.description: a plastic bag with a clue inside

clue.name: receipt
clue.description: a receipt for poison and a bonsai tree from 'Mr. Meowgi's Trees, Feed, and Seed'

name: Living Room
description: A room decorated with fake plants and Birdie Holly sitting on his perch

npc.name: Birdie Holly
npc.dialogue: I used to date Julius, but we ended on good terms. I think he started seeing someone else recently.
randDialogue: It was a murder most fowl.
I'm going to tweet about this.

name: Basement
description: A dark basement with an item in the corner

item.name: safe
item.description: An unlocked safe with a clue inside

clue.name: insurance policy
clue.description: An insurance policy for the victim with the beneficiary named as Hamione Granger

name: Hallway
description: The hallway to get to the other rooms upstairs

name: Bedroom
description: A bedroom with an item under the bed

item.name: shoe box
item.description: A Jimmy Chew shoe box with a clue inside

clue.name: key
clue.description: A key that probably unlocks something

name: Restroom
description: A bathroom that leads to another room

name: Guest Room
description: A bedroom filled with tubes, tunnels, and bonsai trees, and an item on the nightstand

npc.name: Hamione Granger
npc.dialogue: I've only been on a couple dates with Julius, but he went back to Birdie.
randdialogue: I guess he just didn't have the wheel to live.
I can't tell stories because I don't have a tale.

item.name: envelope
item.description: An envelope with a clue inside

clue.name: loan statement
clue.description: A document stating Hamione Granger is in debt
